message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.DL

This paper is about building high-quality machine translation systems and multilingual NLP applications using parallel text data. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with natural language processing and computational linguistics. The paper also mentions the use of automatic sentence alignment methods, which suggests a focus on machine learning and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Additionally, the paper presents some initial results on the corpus using neural machine translation (NMT), indicating a possible focus on deep learning (cs.LG) and deep neural networks (cs.DL). Finally, the paper discusses the construction of the corpus and the assessment of different methods, which suggests a possible focus on information retrieval (cs.IR).
